turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello [Assistant]. Could you place an order with The Pie To Go for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes [You], what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: First, Build-Your-Own 14" Gluten Free Pie please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what type of cheese would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Cheddar/Mozzarella Blend.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, and what type of sauce?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Ranch Sauce, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome. Any toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, the Oven Roasted Chicken and Breakfast Bacon.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, is that all?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I would also like the 14" GF Breadsticks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, which type of GF Breadsticks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Cheesy Breadsticks, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, so a 14" Build-your-Own GF Pie and a 14" GF Cheesy Breadsticks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please ask the cashier for extra marinara sauce.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: He says that extra sauce is 50 cents, is that okay?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that is fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, your order has been placed and will be ready for pickup in 30 minutes.

items.name: Okay, your order has been placed
